hero.description: Cloud infrastructure specialist and full stack developer with experience in AWS, Azure, Kubernetes and modern web applications. I combine cloud expertise with end-to-end development to create complete solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a Cloud Engineer and Full Stack Developer specialized in designing and implementing scalable cloud infrastructures and robust web applications, located in Tegucigalpa, Honduras.
about.description: With over 7 years of experience combining cloud technologies and full stack development, I specialize in legacy application migration, cloud-native architecture implementation, modern web application development, and cost optimization. My focus is on creating complete solutions that drive digital transformation from frontend to infrastructure.

jobs.title: Senior Cloud Engineer & Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Leadership in cloud migration projects and full stack application development for medium and large enterprises, combining infrastructure and development expertise.
achievements: Successfully migrated 25+ legacy applications to AWS with 99.9% uptime, implementing automated monitoring and rollback strategies to ensure zero business disruption
Developed 15+ full stack web applications using Java/Python backends with Angular/Node.js frontends, featuring responsive design and optimal performance
Reduced cloud costs by 40% through comprehensive infrastructure optimization, rightsizing instances, and implementing automated scaling policies
Implemented robust CI/CD pipelines that reduced deployment time by 80%, incorporating automated testing, security scans, and blue-green deployment strategies
Designed and deployed multi-region cloud architectures with automated disaster recovery capabilities, ensuring 99.9% availability and RTO under 15 minutes

jobs.title: Senior Cloud Developer
jobs.description: Leadership in banking infrastructure modernization through cloud computing, development of critical modules and implementation of CI/CD pipelines for mission-critical financial applications.
achievements: Developed and implemented cloud-ready modules for ATM systems processing 10,000+ daily transactions with real-time monitoring and fraud detection capabilities
Designed and integrated comprehensive software products that optimized internal banking processes, reducing operational times by 45% and improving customer satisfaction
Implemented automated ETLs and real-time log analysis systems for critical applications using cloud technologies, ensuring data integrity and regulatory compliance
Facilitated secure integrations with external payment providers and financial institutions, improving banking connectivity and meeting strict regulatory compliance standards
Established CI/CD pipelines from scratch with automated testing and security validation, reducing banking module deployment time from days to hours while maintaining zero-defect releases
Led development of 45+ full stack web applications using Java/Angular stack, implementing responsive design and modern UI/UX principles for enhanced user experience

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Leadership in critical banking core migration from IBS to SAP, implementing cloud-native architectures with microservices in Kubernetes and modernization of legacy applications.
achievements: Executed complete banking core migration from legacy IBS system to modern SAP architecture with zero service interruptions, coordinating with multiple stakeholders across 3-month timeline
Developed and deployed containerized microservices architecture using Docker and orchestrated with Kubernetes on OpenShift, improving system scalability and maintainability by 60%
Implemented critical Jteller application migration from legacy RPG platform to modern Java architecture with Node.js backend, enhancing performance and reducing maintenance costs by 50%
Optimized enterprise banking operations through proactive monitoring systems and automated incident resolution protocols, reducing system downtime by 75%
Established comprehensive containerization and orchestration standards across the organization, reducing deployment time by 70% and improving development team productivity

certifications.title: Certifications

cv.title: Gabriel Sosa ‚Äî CV
skills: Technical leadership of multidisciplinary teams of up to 15 developers; stakeholder management and effective communication with C-level executives.
End-to-end technology solution architecture and design; critical decision-making in $500K+ projects with direct business impact.
